trans-unit.source: Creating a Custom Input Box
trans-unit.target: 创建自定义输入框

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Creating a Custom Input Box
trans-unit.target: 创建自定义输入框

trans-unit.source: Script a graphical custom input box by using Microsoft .NET Framework form-building features in Windows PowerShell 3.0 and later releases.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Windows PowerShell 3.0 及更高版本中的 Microsoft .NET Framework 窗体构建功能为图形自定义输入框编写脚本。

trans-unit.source: Create a custom, graphical input box
trans-unit.target: 创建自定义图形输入框

trans-unit.source: Copy and then paste the following into Windows PowerShell ISE, and then save it as a Windows PowerShell script (.ps1).
trans-unit.target: 复制以下内容并将其粘贴到 Windows PowerShell ISE 中，然后将其另存为 Windows PowerShell 脚本 (.ps1)。

trans-unit.source: The script begins by loading two .NET Framework classes: **System.Drawing** and **System.Windows.Forms**.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本首先加载两个 .NET Framework 类：**System.Drawing** 和 **System.Windows.Forms**。

trans-unit.source: You then start a new instance of the .NET Framework class **System.Windows.Forms.Form**; that provides a blank form or window to which you can start adding controls.
trans-unit.target: 然后，启动 .NET Framework 类 **System.Windows.Forms.Form** 的新实例；它提供一个可以开始添加控件的空白窗体或窗口。

trans-unit.source: After you create an instance of the Form class, assign values to three properties of this class.
trans-unit.target: 在创建 Form 类的实例后，为此类的三个属性赋值。

trans-unit.source: Text.
trans-unit.target: Text。

trans-unit.source: This becomes the title of the window.
trans-unit.target: 这将成为该窗口的标题。

trans-unit.source: Size.
trans-unit.target: Size。

trans-unit.source: This is the size of the form, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 这是窗体的大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The preceding script creates a form that’s 300 pixels wide by 200 pixels tall.
trans-unit.target: 上述脚本创建的窗体大小为宽 300 像素、高 200 像素。

trans-unit.source: StartingPosition.
trans-unit.target: StartingPosition。

trans-unit.source: This optional property is set to **CenterScreen** in the preceding script.
trans-unit.target: 在上述脚本中，此可选属性将设置为 **CenterScreen**。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t add this property, Windows selects a location when the form is opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果未添加此属性，Windows 将在窗体打开时选择一个位置。

trans-unit.source: By setting the **StartingPosition** to **CenterScreen**, you’re automatically displaying the form in the middle of the screen each time it loads.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 **StartingPosition** 设置为 **CenterScreen**，可使窗体在每次加载时都自动显示在屏幕中间。

trans-unit.source: Next, create an **OK** button for your form.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，为窗体创建“确定”按钮。

trans-unit.source: Specify the size and behavior of the **OK** button.
trans-unit.target: 指定“确定”按钮的大小和行为。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the button position is 120 pixels from the form’s top edge, and 75 pixels from the left edge.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，按钮位置为距窗体上边缘 120 像素，距左边缘 75 像素。

trans-unit.source: The button height is 23 pixels, while the button length is 75 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 按钮高度为 23 像素，按钮长度为 75 像素。

trans-unit.source: The script uses predefined Windows Forms types to determine the button behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 此脚本使用预定义的 Windows 窗体类型确定按钮行为。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you create a **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 采用相同方式创建“取消”按钮。

trans-unit.source: The **Cancel** button is 120 pixels from the top, but 150 pixels from the left edge of the window.
trans-unit.target: “取消”按钮距窗口上边缘 120 像素，但距左边缘 150 像素。

trans-unit.source: Next, provide label text on your window that describes the information you want users to provide.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，在窗口上提供标签文本，用于描述你希望用户提供的信息。

trans-unit.source: Add the control (in this case, a text box) that lets users provide the information you’ve described in your label text.
trans-unit.target: 添加控件（在本例中为文本框），从而让用户提供你在标签文本中描述的信息。

trans-unit.source: There are many other controls you can apply besides text boxes; for more controls, see [System.Windows.Forms Namespace](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/k50ex0x9(v=vs.110).aspx) on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 除了文本框，你还可以应用许多其他控件；有关更多控件，请参阅 MSDN 上的 [System.Windows.Forms 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/k50ex0x9(v=vs.110).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Set the **Topmost** property to **$True** to force the window to open atop other open windows and dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 将 **Topmost** 属性设置为 **$True** 以强制该窗口在其他打开的窗口和对话框之上打开。

trans-unit.source: Next, add this line of code to activate the form, and set the focus to the text box that you created.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，添加此代码行以激活窗体，并将焦点设置到你创建的文本框。

trans-unit.source: Add the following line of code to display the form in Windows.
trans-unit.target: 添加以下代码行以在 Windows 中显示该窗体。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code inside the **If** block instructs Windows what to do with the form after users provide text in the text box, and then click the **OK** button or press the **Enter** key.
trans-unit.target: 最后，**If** 块内的代码指示在用户在文本框中提供文本，然后单击“确定”按钮或按“Enter”键后，Windows 应如何处理该窗体。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: [Hey Scripting Guy: Why don’t these PowerShell GUI examples work?](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=506644) [GitHub: Dave Wyatt's WinFormsExampleUpdates](https://github.com/dlwyatt/WinFormsExampleUpdates) [Windows PowerShell Tip of the Week: Creating a Custom Input Box](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/ff730941.aspx)
trans-unit.target: [Hey Scripting Guy: Why don’t these PowerShell GUI examples work?（Hey Scripting Guy 博客：为什么这些 PowerShell GUI 示例不起作用？）](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=506644) [GitHub: Dave Wyatt's WinFormsExampleUpdates（GitHub：Dave Wyatt 的 WinFormsExampleUpdates）](https://github.com/dlwyatt/WinFormsExampleUpdates) [Windows PowerShell Tip of the Week: Creating a Custom Input Box（Windows PowerShell 每周提示：创建自定义输入框）](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/ff730941.aspx)
